Platform.Title: UTHSC/Kotb Streptococcus pyogenes 5.7K
Platform.Manufacturer: Molecular Resource Center, University of Tenessee Health Sciences Center
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: Each array consists of duplicates of 2,328 oligomers (70-mers) that represent all ORFs in M1 GAS, strain SF370 (GenBank accession# NC_002737) in addition to oligomers representing ORFs from prophages in strains MGAS8232 (GenBank accession# NC_003485) and MGAS315 (GenBank accession# NC_004070). The arrays also contained positive and negative controls of streptococcal ribosomal DNA and alien DNA (Stratagene), respectively. This is a condensed version of the full array.

Column.Name: ORF
Column.Description: Spy Number; Comparable ORF# from Oklahoma Sequencing Project

Column.Name: SEQUENCE
Column.Description: Oligo sequence 5'-3' of probe spotted onto arrays

Column.Name: 5'end from ORF start
Column.Description: # of bp between 5' ORF and 5' probe

Column.Name: 3'end from ORF start
Column.Description: # of bp between 5' ORF and 3' probe

Column.Name: Bases from 3'end
Column.Description: # of bp between 5' probe and 3' ORF

Sample.Title: In vitro: WT vs AP 12 h

Channel.Growth-Protocol: In vitro: Bacteria were grown in Todd Hewitt broth supplemented with 1.5% yeast extract for either 12h or (mostly) 18h; In vivo: Overnight in vitro culture was washed in phosphate-buffer saline and injected in sterile Teflon chambers implanted under mice skin
Channel.Extract-Protocol: RNA was extracted with QIAgen RNeasey kit after the bacteria were beaten with beads; RNA was treated with DNase until no contaminating genomic DNA was detected; RNA was purified and concentrated with QIAgen RNeasy Microelute.
Channel.Label: Alexa Fluor 546, Genisphere Dendrimers
Channel.Label-Protocol: Genisphere 3DNA Dendrimers followed by post-hybridization labeling with an equal mixture of Alexa Fluor 546 or 647 post-hybridization

Channel.Growth-Protocol: In vitro: Bacteria were grown in Todd Hewitt broth supplemented with 1.5% yeast extract for either 12h or (mostly) 18h; In vivo: Overnight in vitro culture was washed in phosphate-buffer saline and injected in sterile Teflon chambers implanted under mice skin
Channel.Extract-Protocol: RNA was extracted with QIAgen RNeasey kit after the bacteria were beaten with beads; RNA was treated with DNase until no contaminating genomic DNA was detected; RNA was purified and concentrated with QIAgen RNeasy Microelute.
Channel.Label: Alexa Fluor 647, Genisphere Dendrimers
Channel.Label-Protocol: Genisphere 3DNA Dendrimers followed by post-hybridization labeling with an equal mixture of Alexa Fluor 546 or 647 post-hybridization

Sample.Data-Processing: GenePixPro 4.0 and GeneSpring 7 to output genelists

Channel.Growth-Protocol: In vitro: Bacteria were grown in Todd Hewitt broth supplemented with 1.5% yeast extract for either 12h or (mostly) 18h; In vivo: Overnight in vitro culture was washed in phosphate-buffer saline and injected in sterile Teflon chambers implanted under mice skin
Channel.Extract-Protocol: RNA was extracted with QIAgen RNeasey kit after the bacteria were beaten with beads; RNA was treated with DNase until no contaminating genomic DNA was detected; RNA was purified and concentrated with QIAgen RNeasy Microelute.
Channel.Label: Alexa Fluor 647, Genisphere Dendrimers
Channel.Label-Protocol: Genisphere 3DNA Dendrimers followed by post-hybridization labeling with an equal mixture of Alexa Fluor 546 or 647 post-hybridization

Sample.Data-Processing: GenePixPro 4.0 and GeneSpring 7 to output genelists

Series.Title: M1T1 Streptococcus pyogenes (isolate 5448) WT and Animal-passaged variant in vitro and in vivo
Series.Summary: Microarray analysis was performed on in vitro and in vivo-derived RNA from the well characterized S. pyogenes strain 5448 WT and animal-passage variant
Series.Overall-Design: Cyclic design with dye swap and biological replicates
